entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
